metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30474 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
aom_dsp/grain_table.c in libaom in AOMedia before 2021-03-30 has a use-after-free.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30474` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

aom-tools - 3.3.0-1
libaom3 - 3.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aom package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.0-1').
